#summary install JAP_LOCAL_WS_NODE

=JAP_LOCAL_WS_NODE=

==PRE-INSTALLATION==
  * install NODE >= 0.8.0

==INSTALLATION==
  * unzip JAP_LOCAL_WS_NODE-X.X.X.zip
  * open JAP_LOCAL_WS_NODE-X.X.X
  * execute NM.bat
  * configure JAP_LOCAL_WS.json
  * execute JAP_LOCAL_WS.bat
  * [CONFIGURE_BROWSER configure browser]

==IMPORTANT==
